item.title: Crypto startup Subzero Labs has completed a $20 million seed round financing, with Pantera Capital leading the investment.
item.description: August 2nd: As per Fortune magazine, the cryptocurrency startup Subzero Labs has successfully completed a $20 million seed round of financing. This round was spearheaded by the crypto investment firm Pantera Capital, and it saw the participation of crypto venture funds Variant and Coinbase Ventures, as well as the crypto division of the high-frequency trading firm Susquehanna.Subzero Labs' Co-founder and CEO, Ade Adepoju, declined to reveal the company's valuation subsequent to this financing round. He mentioned that the transaction was finalized in the first quarter of this year and encompassed a combination of equity and token warrants (that is, allocation rights to future yet-to-be-released crypto tokens).Subzero Labs intends to launch a novel blockchain named Rialo, which is crafted for real-world applications. Rialo is not a conventional Layer 1 blockchain - in Adepoju's words, it is "neither Layer 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, nor 6", and he is hesitant to draw comparisons with exi

item.title: Binance Wallet Web Version is Now Live
item.description: On August 2nd, according to official information, Binance has declared the official launch of the Binance Wallet web version - a browser-based decentralized wallet that doesn't require installation or extensions. Users are able to directly carry out on-chain transactions through the Binance website without any additional setup, making it immediately ready for use. The wallet has been integrated into the Binance homepage under the "Trade" tab, facilitating convenient access to various decentralized exchanges (DEX).The new wallet features the Secure Auto Sign (SAS) mechanism. This mechanism ensures asset self-management while enabling quick authorization and automatic transactions, which is suitable for high-speed markets like meme coins. SAS operates within a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE), guaranteeing that the private key remains local and inaccessible to third parties.In addition, the wallet supports seamless cross-device switching. Coupled with a secure QR code authorizatio

item.title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust and Blockchain Opportunities Fund Adjust Dividend Distribution Frequency to Twice Monthly
item.description: On August 1st, as per official information, Grayscale has made an announcement. Immediately, the distribution frequency of the Grayscale Bitcoin Covered Call ETF (with the ticker: BTCC) and the Grayscale Bitcoin Premium Income ETF (with the ticker: BPI) will be modified from monthly to twice a month. Both funds are set to target the 15th and the 30th of each month as the payment dates, and adjustments will be made in accordance with standard business day rules.

item.title: SUI Treasury Management Company Mill City Plans to Raise Another $500 Million, Stock Price Plummets
item.description: On August 1st, as reported by The Block, the US-listed company Mill City Ventures III announced on Friday that it is set to repurchase up to $500 million worth of SUI tokens. Previously, the company had entered into an equity financing agreement with A.G.P./Alliance Global Partners, enabling it to sell common stock to finance its cryptocurrency treasury strategy.This announcement comes after the news on Thursday - Mill City had already spent around $277 million to purchase more than 76 million SUI tokens. The transaction took place after Mill City officially became the Sui corporate treasury manager and completed a $450 million private placement.On Friday, Mill City stated that A.G.P./Alliance Global Partners had agreed to provide an equity financing facility, allowing the company to sell up to $500 million worth of common stock. Mill City said: "The equity financing does not involve any commitment fees, and all the proceeds from the financing will be utilized to advance the compan

item.title: An address holding 306 BTC has just been activated after 12.4 years of dormancy
item.description: On August 1st, as monitored by Whale Alert, an address that was holding 306 BTC (approximately $35.16 million) was just made active after having been dormant for 12.4 years.

item.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary: Actively Exploring the Potential of Decentralized Computing and Digital Payments to Unleash the Power of Blockchain Technology
item.description: On August 1st, U.S. Treasury Secretary Benson made a post on social media, saying, "The United States has stepped into the golden era of cryptocurrency. We are delving into new possibilities regarding decentralized computing and digital payments, with the goal of tapping the potential of blockchain technology. Thus, establish a company here, launch a protocol, and hire employees."

item.title: Non-Farm Payroll Data Validates Powell and Bowman's Justification for Rate Cut: Labor Market Shows Signs of Weakness
item.description: August 1st: On August 1st, the U.S. labor data provided support for calls for monetary easing. As a result, U.S. Treasury yields and the U.S. dollar declined. Meanwhile, previous data was revised significantly downward: the May nonfarm payroll number was revised from 144,000 to 19,000, and the June nonfarm payroll number was revised from 147,000 to 14,000.Before the release of the employment report, Federal Reserve Board members Waller and Bowman, who held different views, indicated signs of weakness in the labor market. The market experienced a sharp decline immediately after the release of the employment data. (FXStreet)

item.title: Gryphon shareholders will vote on the proposed merger with Bitcoin mining firm American Bitcoin on August 27.
item.description: August 1st: As per The Miner Mag, American Bitcoin Corp (ABC), a Bitcoin mining firm with the backing of the Trump family, is scheduled to finalize a covert merger with Gryphon Digital Mining and get listed on Nasdaq.On July 31st, Gryphon submitted a proxy statement in connection with the merger to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), and officially set a shareholder vote for August 27th. Meanwhile, the SEC has declared the effectiveness of the S-4 registration statement for the transaction, indicating that regulatory approval has been obtained and clearing the way for the merger.

item.title: Boston Fed: Still Expects One Rate Cut This Year
item.description: On August 1st, the Boston Fed stated that although employment data is significant, revisions are even more crucial. The job market is showing a slowdown from a strong position. The inflation risk is far greater than the employment risk. It still anticipates cutting interest rates once this year. (Xinhua)

item.title: ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK) Receives Record Single-Day Inflow
item.description: On August 1st, Bloomberg ETF Senior Analyst Eric Balchunas posted on social media that ARKK attracted $800 million within just one day, establishing a new all-time record for daily fund inflows. This is probably because the fund has seen a 50% surge in the past 3 months, which is double the gains of SPY, QQQ, and IBIT. ARKK attracted $150 million in inflows, and the total daily fund inflows for the entire ARK series reached nearly $1 billion.
